# Git Fundamentals {.tabset}

*March 13, 2017*

## Article

### Overview

Of all the tools I use as a data scientist, the one that I cherish the most is **[Git](https://git-scm.com/)**. As a free and open source *distributed* version control system, Git plays an integral role in data science workflows by seamlessly fostering many of the most important considerations of said workflows including **collaboration**, **experimentation**, **reproducibility** and of course, **source code management**.
